HousingInstability: Mother shared that the family was able to visit over the weekend and check in to Ronald McDonald House. Family had to check out to return home at the end of the weekend as Lance's sister attends school.
FinancialStrain: Mother shared the she spoke with FHCP representative Rosemarie Padilla regarding applying for NJ Family Care (NJ Medical Assistance) for Lance.

Family has limited financial resources for mother to take a Lyft or an Uber to the hospital and does not have friends or family in the area who can provide a ride to CHOP. Social worker arranged a round trip Lyft ride for mother on 6/1/23.
